data.name: Revolution 1.6-2
data.author: Thumblegudget, Bredroll, QuantX, NexusQuille, Dr-RazdalByte + Others
data.description:
The Revolution mod brings Radar enhancements, a more immersive fog-of-war for island captures and other features.
v1.6 new features: [list] [*] Excess aircraft payloads shown visually in loadout, Some units have hard max payloads for balance [*] 2x water speed as standard for all units, WLR can deploy AA missiles [*] Helm and Radar screens are HD, Helm HUD and VLS as standard. [*] QoL changes to the inventory screen map display/tooltips [*] Barges and Virus bots now actually have names. [*] Removed the EW pod and EWar mechanic [/list]
v1.5: [list] [*] Improved UI for turret deployment by Dr-RazdalByte [*] Reduced network traffic/congestion sent by shared holomap cursor, Fixed captain's holomap markers [*] TV missile shows minimap and distances to target and launcher and has compass marks [*] Next generation aircraft RWR sensor [*] Turrets can now be moved around by ground vehicles pushing. [/list]
[list] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3098073689]v1.5 available here[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3496283808]v1.4 available here[/url] [/list]
For full details on what the mod does, how you can contribute or request features see [url=https://cc2maps.com/revolution-mod/]https://cc2maps.com/revolution-mod/[/url]
The mod is based on UI Enhancer and Albatross AWACS, so you get those amazing benefits included.
